issue.title: Could we adjust the height of the solar array box

content.raw:
I think this has been highlighted as a fairly major issue, both here, and for the height of the table for task #3.

I Googled 'best height for a work bench' which is what these surfaces are, in effect.  And the answer is that a good workbench for a 2 meter high person is about 1 meter high.  Which both of these work surfaces fall very short of.

Again, it's hard to believe that NASA would send low slung tables to Mars.
